detail_desc: Off-the-shoulder blouse in a crinkled weave containing some linen with elastication and smocking around the top and long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist.
Short dress in a viscose weave with pin-tucks front and back, a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening with ties at the top. Long, wide raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-high boots in imitation suede with a zip in one side and drawstring at the top. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Sunglasses with acetate frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Long-sleeved blouse in a patterned weave with a V-neck, lace details at the front, and smocking and a flounce at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front and racer back with sections in ventilating mesh. Elastic hem with transparent sections. Medium support.
Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped front pockets, a hook and loop tab at the cuffs and reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped pocket on one sleeve, welt front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Fully lined, smocked bikini bottoms with a low waist and high cut at the back.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped chest pocket, pockets in the side seams, an inner pocket with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Jazz trousers in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. High waist with concealed elastication, and straight-cut legs with flared hems.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Small stand-up collar and an opening with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Pin-tucks at the top of the front, a gathered yoke at the back, long puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with covered buttons. Wide fit with a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Aqua shoes in scuba fabric with a loop front and back, and textured thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and buttoned cuffs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a hood and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Short cycling shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Straight-cut coat in a woven wool blend in a relaxed fit with narrow notch lapels and buttons down the front. Flap front pockets, one inner pocket, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch cotton denim with worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and a raw-edge hem.
Ankle boots with elastic gores in the sides, a loop at the back and covered heels. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Boxy top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text print, ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and open pockets front and back.
Set with a top and skirt in soft, organic cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top that is rounded and slightly longer at the back. Tiered skirt with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Tunic in soft fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with two buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Super push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back and elasticated ribbing at the hem. Designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.

Calf-length, double-breasted coat woven in a wool blend with a lightly brushed finish. Large hood and lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist, diagonal welt front pockets and a high-cut single back vent. Recycled polyester lining. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
PREMIUM QUALITY. Hat in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend.
Long off-the-shoulder dress in a patterned, crinkled viscose weave with an elasticated top, short sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Card holder in grained imitation leather with a flap and button and four inner compartments. Size 1.5x7x10 cm.
Wide, short jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing glittery threads with long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Lined triangle bikini top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Slides in satin made from recycled polyester decorated at the top with large knots in rope covered in recycled glass beads. Thermoplastic rubber soles.
Short-sleeved jersey top in a soft modal and cotton blend with a print motif on the front and tie at the hem.

Handbag in imitation leather with a faux fur front. Embroidery and glittery appliqués in the shape of ears and a unicorn horn on the front, and two handles and a zip at the top. Lined. Height 14 cm. Width 20 cm.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with comfortable stretch. Narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, jetted front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a button placket and chest pocket in woven fabric.
Shaping bikers in sturdy mesh with a high waist, lined gusset and legs. Light sculpting effect on the tummy, bum and thighs.
Sleep bag in patterned fleece with a press-stud on one shoulder and a concealed zip in one side that opens from the bottom. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.

Shirt woven in a patterned viscose blend with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Cropped top in a crinkled viscose weave with lace details and hole embroidery. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck with a wrapover front and an elasticated hem.

Knee-length wrap dress in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck and seam with ties at the waist. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and frill trims, and frill-trimmed edges on the skirt. Unlined.
Elasticated plastic necklaces, one with faceted plastic beads.
Lace body with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck and fastening at the crotch.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, pair of leggings, all-in-one pyjamas, a T-shirt and a hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with a wide foldover waistband, elasticated heels and full feet. Pyjamas with an all-over print, press-studs down the front and at the crotch, elasticated heels and full feet. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and lapped shoulders.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder, decorative flatlock seams at the front, twisted seams at the sides and slits at the hem.
Sleeveless top in woven fabric with tie-top shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back.
Three-strand neckline of thin metal chains with two pendants. Adjustable length, 39-47 cm.
Cotton canvas hi-tops with a padded edge, hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Gently flared blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a frill-trimmed yoke, buttons at the back of the neck and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an overlocked flounce at the top and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Tops in soft jersey with a racer back and an elasticated hem. The tops are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Two-button jacket in a woven cotton blend with notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets, two inner pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
STUDIO COLLECTION. T-shirt in soft, airy cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Wrapover hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Harem trousers in jersey with elastication at the waist and hems.
Trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Fully lined, textured bikini. Top with wide, bow-topped shoulder straps. Matching bottoms.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a round neckline and cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Covered elastication at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Small bag in grained imitation leather with a shoulder strap and zip at the top. Lined. Size 17x25 cm.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Stand-up collar and a detachable hood with an elasticated front edge. Reflective detail on one sleeve, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Thin metal chain necklace with a round, hammered pendant. Adjustable length, 47-53 cm.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Long dress in woven fabric made partly from recycled polyester. Deep V-neck front and back with narrow, padded trims and wide shoulder straps. High-cut, gathered waist with narrow, padded stitching, a zip in one side and a wide, dramatically draping, pleated skirt with an inner layer of tulle and a high slit at the front. Reinforcing grosgrain waistband with an adjustable fastening on the inside for a firmer fit around the waist. The tulle is in RENU™ polyester – a high-quality polyester made from raw material recycled from used textiles.
Slippers in soft fabric with a bow at the front. Faux fur linings and insoles, and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, and no fasteners. Lined.

Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a wide, elasticated neckline and sewn-on ties at the front. Long, wide sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a gently flared hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Ankle-length joggers in a textured weave with wide jersey ribbing and a drawstring at the waist. Welt side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with short slits at the hems.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a double-layered trim at the top, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fisherman’s hat in a cotton blend with a tie. Lined.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, ties at the back of the neck and no fasteners.
